thm fsumclf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), cc))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqeltrd(csu(s0, c0, c1), cc, csu(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))
  cbvsum(s0, hs0, c0, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  fsumcl(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfel1(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1d(c1, cc, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsumclf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqeltrd(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), cc, sum(hs0 ∈ c0,[hs0 / s0]c1), w0)
  a1i(w0, sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= sum(hs0 ∈ c0,[hs0 / s0]c1))
  cbvsum(s0, hs0, c0, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1)
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  fsumcl(hs0, c0, [hs0 / s0]c1, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)→[hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ ℂ), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ ℂ)
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfel1(s0, [hs0 / s0]c1, cc)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c1)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c1 ∈ ℂ, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ ℂ)
  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1d(c1, cc, [hs0 / s0]c1, s0 = hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

blocks.content: Closure of a finite sum of complex numbers ` A ( k ) ` . A version of ~ fsummulc1 using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)

thm fsummulc1f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(csu(s0, c0, c1), cmul, c2), csu(s0, c0, co(c1, cmul, c2))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(csu(s0, c0, c1), cmul, c2), csu(s0, c0, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(csu(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), cmul, c2), csu(hs0, c0, co(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cmul, c2)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(co(csu(s0, c0, c1), cmul, c2), co(csu(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), cmul, c2)))
  oveq1i(csu(s0, c0, c1), cmul, c2, csu(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  cbvsum(s0, hs0, c0, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  fsummulc1(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c2, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfel1(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1d(c1, cc, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  a1i(w0, wceq(csu(hs0, c0, co(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cmul, c2)), csu(s0, c0, co(c1, cmul, c2))))
  cbvsum(hs0, s0, c0, co(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cmul, c2), co(c1, cmul, c2))
  oveq1d(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cmul, c2, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  mpbi(wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c1)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  bitri(wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c1)), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))
  imbi1i(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  eqcom(cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  imbi2i(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c1))
  eqcom(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfov(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cmul, c2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  nfcv(s0, cmul)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  nfcv(hs0, co(c1, cmul, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cmul, c2))
}

thm fsummulc1f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[×]c2)= sum(s0 ∈ c0,(c1[×]c2)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  3eqtrd((sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[×]c2), sum(s0 ∈ c0,(c1[×]c2)), (sum(hs0 ∈ c0,[hs0 / s0]c1)[×]c2), sum(hs0 ∈ c0,([hs0 / s0]c1[×]c2)), w0)
  a1i(w0, (sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[×]c2)=(sum(hs0 ∈ c0,[hs0 / s0]c1)[×]c2))
  oveq1i(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), cmul, c2, sum(hs0 ∈ c0,[hs0 / s0]c1))
  cbvsum(s0, hs0, c0, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  fsummulc1(hs0, c0, [hs0 / s0]c1, c2, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)→[hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ ℂ), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ ℂ)
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfel1(s0, [hs0 / s0]c1, cc)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c1 ∈ ℂ, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ ℂ)
  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1d(c1, cc, [hs0 / s0]c1, s0 = hs0)
  a1i(w0, sum(hs0 ∈ c0,([hs0 / s0]c1[×]c2))= sum(s0 ∈ c0,(c1[×]c2)))
  cbvsum(hs0, s0, c0, ([hs0 / s0]c1[×]c2), (c1[×]c2))
  oveq1d([hs0 / s0]c1, cmul, c2, c1, hs0 = s0)
  mpbi((hs0 = s0 →[hs0 / s0]c1 = c1), (s0 = hs0 → c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1))
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c1)
  bitri((s0 = hs0 → c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1), (hs0 = s0 →[hs0 / s0]c1 = c1), (hs0 = s0 → c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1))
  imbi1i(s0 = hs0, c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1, hs0 = s0)
  eqcom(s0, hs0)
  imbi2i(hs0 = s0, c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1, [hs0 / s0]c1 = c1)
  eqcom(c1, [hs0 / s0]c1)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfov(s0, [hs0 / s0]c1, cmul, c2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, cmul)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  nfcv(hs0, (c1[×]c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c((c1[×]c2))
}

blocks.name: fsumnncl
blocks.content: Closure of a nonempty, finite sum of positive integers. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)

thm fsumnncl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), cn))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cn))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), cn), wa(wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), cn0), wbr(nat0, clt, csu(s0, c0, c1))))
  jca(w0, wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), cn0), wbr(nat0, clt, csu(s0, c0, c1)))
  fsumnn0cl(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  mpd(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, csu(s0, c0, c1)), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  sylib(w0, wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wne(c0, emptycls))
  n0(hs0, c0)
  exlimdv(hs0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(nat0, clt, csu(s0, c0, c1)))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(nat0, clt, csu(s0, c0, c1)))
  breqtrd(nat0, clt, csu(s0, c0, c1), co(csu(s0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), c1), caddc, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  ltletrd(nat0, co(csu(s0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), c1), caddc, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), co(nat0, caddc, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  readdcld(nat0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  readdcld(csu(s0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  ltaddrpd(nat0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  nnrpd(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  leadd1dd(nat0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csu(s0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  0red(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(csu(s0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), c1), cr))
  nn0red(csu(s0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), c1), w0)
  nnred(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, csu(s0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), c1)))
  nn0ge0d(csu(s0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), c1), w0)
  fsumnn0cl(s0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), c1, w0)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  nnnn0d(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  eqtr2d(co(csu(s0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), c1), caddc, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(s0, cun(cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), csn(cv(hs0))), c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  sumeq1d(s0, c0, c1, cun(cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), csn(cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  eqcomd(c0, cun(cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), csn(cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cun(cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), csn(cv(hs0))), c0))
  difsnid(cv(hs0), c0)
  fsumsplitsn(s0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cv(hs0), c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cfn))
  syl(w0, wcel(cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cfn), wcel(c0, cfn))
  diffi(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  neldifsnd(cv(hs0), c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(c1, cc))
  nncnd(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))))))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))))), wcel(c1, cn), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  simpl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  eldifi(cv(s0), c0, csn(cv(hs0)))
  sseldd(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc, cn, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wss(cn, cc))
  nnsscn()
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cn)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cn)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cn))
  nfv(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  nfel1(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cn)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cn), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cn))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1d(c1, cn, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  elnnnn0b(csu(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(nat0, clt, csu(s0, c0, c1)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.cun.s(s0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), csn(cv(hs0)))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c0, csn(cv(hs0)))
  diff.csn.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsumnncl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ ℕ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ ∅)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℕ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ ℕ, (sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ ℕ0 ∧ 0[<]sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)))
  jca(w0, sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ ℕ0, 0[<]sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  fsumnn0cl(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  mpd(w0, 0[<]sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈ c0))
  sylib(w0, ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈ c0), c0 ≠ ∅)
  n0(hs0, c0)
  exlimdv(hs0, w0, hs0 ∈ c0, 0[<]sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  ex(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, 0[<]sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  breqtrd(nat0, clt, sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), (sum(s0 ∈(c0 \ { hs0 }), c1)[+][hs0 / s0]c1), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))

blocks.name: fsumsplit1
blocks.content: Separate out a term in a finite sum. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)

thm fsumsplit1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, caddc, csu(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c3)), c1))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c0))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c3), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  3eqtrd(csu(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, caddc, csu(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c3)), c1)), csu(s0, cun(cdif(c0, csn(c3)), csn(c3)), c1), co(csu(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c3)), c1), caddc, c2), w0)
  sumeq1d(s0, c0, c1, cun(cdif(c0, csn(c3)), csn(c3)), w0)
  3eqtrrd(c0, cun(cdif(c0, csn(c3)), csn(c3)), cun(csn(c3), cdif(c0, csn(c3))), c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cun(cdif(c0, csn(c3)), csn(c3)), cun(csn(c3), cdif(c0, csn(c3)))))
  uncom(cdif(c0, csn(c3)), csn(c3))
  sylib(w0, wceq(cun(csn(c3), cdif(c0, csn(c3))), c0), wss(csn(c3), c0))
  snssd(c3, c0, w0)
  undif(csn(c3), c0)
  eqidd(c0, w0)
  fsumsplitsn(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c3)), c3, c1, c2, c0, w0)
  neldifsnd(c3, c0, w0)
  addcomd(csu(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c3)), c1), c2, w0)
  fsumclf(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c3)), c1, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cdif(c0, csn(c3)), cfn), wcel(c0, cfn))
  diffi(c0, csn(c3))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, csn(c3)))), wcel(c1, cc), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  simpl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, csn(c3))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, csn(c3))), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  eldifi(cv(s0), c0, csn(c3))
  eqeltrd(c2, cc, csb(s0, c3, c1), w0)
  eqcomd(c2, csb(s0, c3, c1), w0)
  csbiedf(s0, c3, c1, c2, c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, wnfc(s0, c2))
  syl(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(cv(s0), c3))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3))
  sylc(w0, wcel(csb(s0, c3, c1), cc), wcel(c3, c0), wa(w0, wcel(c3, c0)))
  ancli(w0, wcel(c3, c0))
  vtoclgf(s0, c3, c0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(csb(s0, c3, c1), cc)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(csb(s0, c3, c1), cc))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(c3, c0))
  nfv(s0, wcel(c3, c0))
  nfel(s0, csb(s0, c3, c1), cc)
  nfcsb1(s0, c3, c1)
  nfcv(s0, c3)
  nfcv(s0, cc)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c3), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc), wa(w0, wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(csb(s0, c3, c1), cc))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), c3), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c3, c0))
  eleq1(cv(s0), c3, c0)
  eleq1d(c1, cc, csb(s0, c3, c1), wceq(cv(s0), c3))

  diff.csn.s(s0, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, c0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

thm fsumsplit1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)=(c2[+]sum(s0 ∈(c0 \ { c3 }), c1)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ (s0 = c3 → c1 = c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  3eqtrd(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), (c2[+]sum(s0 ∈(c0 \ { c3 }), c1)), sum(s0 ∈((c0 \ { c3 })⋃ { c3 }), c1), (sum(s0 ∈(c0 \ { c3 }), c1)[+]c2), w0)
  sumeq1d(s0, c0, c1, ((c0 \ { c3 })⋃ { c3 }), w0)
  3eqtrrd(c0, ((c0 \ { c3 })⋃ { c3 }), ({ c3 } ⋃(c0 \ { c3 })), c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, ((c0 \ { c3 })⋃ { c3 })=({ c3 } ⋃(c0 \ { c3 })))
  uncom((c0 \ { c3 }), { c3 })
  sylib(w0, ({ c3 } ⋃(c0 \ { c3 }))= c0, { c3 } ⊆ c0)
  snssd(c3, c0, w0)
  undif({ c3 }, c0)
  eqidd(c0, w0)
  fsumsplitsn(s0, (c0 \ { c3 }), c3, c1, c2, c0, w0)
  neldifsnd(c3, c0, w0)
  addcomd(sum(s0 ∈(c0 \ { c3 }), c1), c2, w0)
  fsumclf(s0, (c0 \ { c3 }), c1, w0)
  syl(w0, (c0 \ { c3 })∈ Fin, c0 ∈ Fin)
  diffi(c0, { c3 })
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0 \ { c3 })), c1 ∈ ℂ, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  simpl(w0, s0 ∈(c0 \ { c3 }))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈(c0 \ { c3 }), s0 ∈ c0)
  eldifi(s0, c0, { c3 })
  eqeltrd(c2, cc, [c3 / s0]c1, w0)
  eqcomd(c2, [c3 / s0]c1, w0)
  csbiedf(s0, c3, c1, c2, c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, F/(s0, c2))
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 = c3), c1 = c2, s0 = c3)
  simpr(w0, s0 = c3)
  sylc(w0, [c3 / s0]c1 ∈ ℂ, c3 ∈ c0, (w0 ∧ c3 ∈ c0))
  ancli(w0, c3 ∈ c0)
  vtoclgf(s0, c3, c0, ((w0 ∧ c3 ∈ c0)→[c3 / s0]c1 ∈ ℂ), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ c3 ∈ c0), [c3 / s0]c1 ∈ ℂ)
  nfan(s0, w0, c3 ∈ c0)
  nfv(s0, c3 ∈ c0)
  nfel(s0, [c3 / s0]c1, cc)
  nfcsb1(s0, c3, c1)
  nfcv(s0, c3)
  nfcv(s0, cc)
  imbi12d(s0 = c3, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c1 ∈ ℂ, (w0 ∧ c3 ∈ c0), [c3 / s0]c1 ∈ ℂ)
  anbi2d(s0 = c3, w0, s0 ∈ c0, c3 ∈ c0)
  eleq1(s0, c3, c0)
  eleq1d(c1, cc, [c3 / s0]c1, s0 = c3)
  csbeq1a(s0, c3, c1)
  diff.cun.s(s0, (c0 \ { c3 }), { c3 })
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c0, { c3 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, c0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fsumge0cl
blocks.content: The finite sum of nonnegative reals is a nonnegative real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumge0cl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  elicod(csu(s0, c0, c1), nat0, cpnf, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat0, cxr))
  a1i(w0, wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  rexrd(csu(s0, c0, c1), w0)
  fsumge0(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wcel(nat0, cxr), wcel(cpnf, cxr), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(nat0, cxr))
  0xr()
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  icogelb(nat0, cpnf, c1)
  ltpnfd(csu(s0, c0, c1), w0)
  fsumrecl(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  sseldi(c1, cr, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  rge0ssre()
}

thm fsumge0cl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈(0[[,)]+∞))

thm fsumf1of(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfn))

  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s1)), c4))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  3eqtrd(csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(s1, c2, c3), csu(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), csu(hs1, c2, csb(s1, cv(hs1), c3)), w0)

  cbvsum(s0, hs0, c0, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  fsumf1o(hs0, hs1, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c2, csb(s1, cv(hs1), c3), csb(s1, cv(hs1), c4), c5, w0)

  eqeq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs1), c4))
  eqeq1d(c1, csb(s1, cv(hs1), c3), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  chvar(s1, hs1, wi(wceq(cv(s0), csb(s1, cv(hs1), c4)), wceq(c1, csb(s1, cv(hs1), c3))), wi(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(c1, c3)))

  nfeq(s1, c1, csb(s1, cv(hs1), c3))

  eqeq2d(cv(s0), c4, csb(s1, cv(hs1), c4), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs1)))

  chvar(s1, hs1, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c5, cv(hs1)), csb(s1, cv(hs1), c4))), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s1)), c4)))

  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs1)), w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))
  eleq1w(s1, hs1, c2)
  eqeq12d(cfv(c5, cv(s1)), c4, cfv(c5, cv(hs1)), csb(s1, cv(hs1), c4), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs1)))

thm fsumreclf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), cr))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqeltrd(csu(s0, c0, c1), cr, csu(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))
  cbvsum(s0, hs0, c0, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  fsumrecl(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cr)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cr))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfel1(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cr)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cr))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1d(c1, cr, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}

  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c1)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c1 ∈ ℝ, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ ℝ)
  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c0)

blocks.name: fsumlessf
blocks.content: A shorter sum of nonnegative terms is smaller than a longer one. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 21-Nov-2020.)

thm fsumlessf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

  nfel1(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cr)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c1, cr), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cr))
  eleq1d(c1, cr, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wbr(nat0, cle, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(nat0, cle, c1)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wbr(nat0, cle, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfbr(s0, nat0, cle, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcv(s0, nat0)
  nfcv(s0, cle)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wbr(nat0, cle, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c2)
  breq2d(nat0, cle, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  breq12i(csu(s0, c0, c1), cle, csu(s0, c2, c1), csu(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), csu(hs0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  cbvsum(s0, hs0, c0, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))

  nfcv(hs0, c2)

  nfcv(hs0, c1)

  diff.hs0.c(c0)

thm fsumlessf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[≤]sum(s0 ∈ c2, c1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ 0[≤]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[≤]sum(s0 ∈ c2, c1), sum(hs0 ∈ c0,[hs0 / s0]c1)[≤]sum(hs0 ∈ c2,[hs0 / s0]c1))
  fsumless(hs0, c0, [hs0 / s0]c1, c2, w0)

  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ c2)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c2)
  breq2d(nat0, cle, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1, s0 = hs0)
  breq12i(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), cle, sum(s0 ∈ c2, c1), sum(hs0 ∈ c0,[hs0 / s0]c1), sum(hs0 ∈ c2,[hs0 / s0]c1))
  cbvsum(s0, hs0, c0, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1)

  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  mpbird(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, co(c0, csupp, nat0)))), wn(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), nat0))), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, csupp, nat0)), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c1, wne(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), nat0))))

thm fsumsupp0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈(c0[supp]0),(c0 ` s0))= sum(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c1 → ℂ))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  fsumss(s0, (c0[supp]0), (c0 ` s0), c1, w0)
  ffvelrnd(c0, s0, cc, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[supp]0)))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈(c0[supp]0), (c0 : c1 → ℂ))
  sselda(s0, (c0[supp]0), c1, w0)
  syl6eqss((c0[supp]0), c1, { s0 ∈ c1 |(c0 ` s0)≠ 0 }, w0)
  ssrab2(s0, c1, (c0 ` s0)≠ 0)
  condan((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1 \(c0[supp]0))), (c0 ` s0)= 0, s0 ∈(c0[supp]0))
  mpbird(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1 \(c0[supp]0)))∧ ¬(c0 ` s0)= 0), s0 ∈(c0[supp]0), s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 |(c0 ` s0)≠ 0 })
  adantll(w0, s0 ∈(c1 \(c0[supp]0)), ¬(c0 ` s0)= 0, s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 |(c0 ` s0)≠ 0 })
  sylibr((s0 ∈(c1 \(c0[supp]0))∧ ¬(c0 ` s0)= 0), s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 |(c0 ` s0)≠ 0 }, (s0 ∈ c1 ∧(c0 ` s0)≠ 0))
  jca((s0 ∈(c1 \(c0[supp]0))∧ ¬(c0 ` s0)= 0), s0 ∈ c1, (c0 ` s0)≠ 0)
  adantr(s0 ∈(c1 \(c0[supp]0)), ¬(c0 ` s0)= 0, s0 ∈ c1)
  eldifi(s0, c1, (c0[supp]0))
  adantl(s0 ∈(c1 \(c0[supp]0)), ¬(c0 ` s0)= 0, (c0 ` s0)≠ 0)
  neqne((c0 ` s0), nat0)
  rabid(s0, c1, (c0 ` s0)≠ 0)
  ad2antrr(w0, s0 ∈(c1 \(c0[supp]0)), ¬(c0 ` s0)= 0, (s0 ∈(c0[supp]0)↔ s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 |(c0 ` s0)≠ 0 }))
  eleq2d(s0, (c0[supp]0), { s0 ∈ c1 |(c0 ` s0)≠ 0 }, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (c0[supp]0)= { s0 ∈ c1 |(c0 ` s0)≠ 0 }, c0[Fn]c1, c1 ∈ Fin, 0 ∈ ℝ)
  ffnd(c0, c1, cc, w0)
  0red(w0)
  suppvalfn(s0, c0, c1, cfn, nat0, cr)
  ad2antlr(w0, s0 ∈(c1 \(c0[supp]0)), ¬(c0 ` s0)= 0, ¬ s0 ∈(c0[supp]0))
  eldifn(s0, c1, (c0[supp]0))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, csupp, nat0)
  diff.csupp.s(s0)
  diff.cfn.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)

thm fsumsermpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 = c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ c3 =(ℤ≥ ` c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3)→ c4 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ c0 =(s1 ∈ c3 ↦ sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]s1), c4))
  ⊣ c1 = seq(c2(+,(s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqfnfvd(hs0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, c0[Fn]c3, ∀(hs0 ∈ c3, sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]hs0), c4)∈ ℂ))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c3, w0, sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]hs0), c4)∈ ℂ)
  fnmpt(hs0, c3, sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]hs0), c4), cc, c0)
  mpbird(w0, c1[Fn]c3, seq(c2(+,(s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4)))[Fn]c3)
  ffnd(seq(c2(+,(s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4))), c3, cc, w0)
  seqf(hs1, hs2, c2, caddc, (s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4), c3, cc, w0)
  eqeltrd(((s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4)` hs1), cc, [hs1 / s0]c4, (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3))
  adantl(w0, (hs1 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs2 ∈ ℂ), (hs1[+]hs2)∈ ℂ)
  addcl(hs1, hs2)
  fneq1d(c1, c3, seq(c2(+,(s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4))), w0)
  a1i(w0, c1 = seq(c2(+,(s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4))))
  3eqtrd((c0 ` hs0), (c1 ` hs0), sum(hs1 ∈(c2[...]hs0),[hs1 / s0]c4), (seq(c2(+,(s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4)))` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3))
  eqtrd((c0 ` hs0), sum(hs1 ∈(c2[...]hs0),[hs1 / s0]c4), sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]hs0), c4), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3), (c0 ` hs0)= sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]hs0), c4), hs0 ∈ c3, sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]hs0), c4)∈ ℂ)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c3)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]hs0), c4)∈ ℂ)
  fsumcl(s0, (c2[...]hs0), c4, w0)
  fzfid(c2, hs0, w0)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c2[...]hs0)), c4 ∈ ℂ, w0, s0 ∈ c3)
  simpl(w0, s0 ∈(c2[...]hs0))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈(c2[...]hs0), s0 ∈ c3)
  syl6eleqr(s0, c3, (ℤ≥ ` c2), s0 ∈(c2[...]hs0))
  elfzuz(s0, c2, hs0)
  fvmpt2(hs0, c3, sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]hs0), c4), cc, c0)
  eqtri(c0, (hs0 ∈ c3 ↦ sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]hs0), c4)), (s1 ∈ c3 ↦ sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]s1), c4)))
  cbvmptv(s1, hs0, c3, sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]s1), c4), sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]hs0), c4))
  sumeq1d(s0, (c2[...]s1), c4, (c2[...]hs0), s1 = hs0)
  oveq2(s1, hs0, c2, cfz)
  a1i((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3), sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]hs0), c4)= sum(hs1 ∈(c2[...]hs0),[hs1 / s0]c4))
  cbvsum(s0, hs1, (c2[...]hs0), c4, [hs1 / s0]c4)
  nfcv(hs1, (c2[...]hs0))
  nfcv(s0, (c2[...]hs0))
  nfcv(hs1, c4)
  fsumser(hs1, c2, hs0, [hs1 / s0]c4, (s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3))
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, hs1 ∈(c2[...]hs0), ((s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4)` hs1)=[hs1 / s0]c4)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈(c2[...]hs0)), ((s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4)` hs1)=[hs1 / s0]c4, w0, hs1 ∈ c3)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3), ((s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4)` hs1)=[hs1 / s0]c4, hs1 ∈ c3, [hs1 / s0]c4 ∈ ℂ)
  simpr(w0, hs1 ∈ c3)
  fvmptf(s0, hs1, c3, [hs1 / s0]c4, cc, (s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4), c4)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4))
  adantl(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c2))
  syl6eleq(hs0, (ℤ≥ ` c2), c3, hs0 ∈ c3)
  id(hs0 ∈ c3)
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, hs1 ∈(c2[...]hs0), [hs1 / s0]c4 ∈ ℂ)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈(c2[...]hs0)), [hs1 / s0]c4 ∈ ℂ, w0, hs1 ∈ c3)
  simpl(w0, hs1 ∈(c2[...]hs0))
  adantl(w0, hs1 ∈(c2[...]hs0), hs1 ∈ c3)
